entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
